headline: UBS downgrades Albemarle to Sell on prolonged lithium glut, price risk
summary: Investing.com -- UBS downgraded Albemarle (NYSE:ALB) Corp to Sell from Neutral, saying that lithium markets are likely to remain oversupplied through 2026, weighing on prices and putting earnings expectations at risk.
